alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 10:51AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Wakulla, southwestern Jefferson and south central Leon Counties through 1115 AM EDT... At 1051 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Crawfordville to 6 miles southeast of St. Marks. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Woodville, St. Marks, Crawfordville, Wakulla, Newport, Shadeville, Port Leon, Hyde Park, Natural Bridge, Vereen, Plum Orchard and Wakulla Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Wakulla; Leon
